attributes.action: Condemn the use of non-nuclear and chemical weapons on Afghanistan
attributes.additional_details:
Information on the size and power of the bomb, as well as the reason of the bombing: 
https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/amp.cnn.com/cnn/2017/04/13/politics/afghanistan-isis-moab-bomb/index.html

Within this article the destructive power of the bomb is highlighted, and is clarified. The reason as to why the U.K shouldn't follow in the steps of the US is also made apparent.
attributes.background: The USA dropped the MOAB on Afghanistan today. Of course this was done to destroy 'ISIS' tunnels, but a bomb of this scale is clearly unproportionate to the threat. This act almost made Afghanistan seem like a testing ground to the US. I urge the UK government to condemn such action and not follow.
